overview: A man and his companion take a midnight stroll through the city streets of Philadelphia.  My ulterior motive prior to making this film was to basically bring a few of my filmmakers/friends together from the Philadelphia area and give everyone the chance to meet... network... create...collaborate. I just wanted everyone to hang out and have a good time. My goal was to make this film as minimalistic as possible while maintaining the true essence, pleasure and bond that comes from walking ones companion.
tagline: A man and his companion take a midnight stroll through the city streets of Philadelphia.
title: A Walk With Harry
